about_the_game:
One of Them is a Social Deduction online 4 to 12-player game where you either play as an Astronaut trying to survive, or an alien beast out for blood. Sneak and convince your way to your objective. But always remember, no one can hear you scream.



As a Human, your goal is to find the tasks that have been assigned to you and complete them, while avoiding being killed by the beast. If you discover a dead body, you can report it to others and start a discussion to eliminate who (probably) did it.

Be careful, They will use anything in Their power to make you think one of your friends is guilty.

If you die, don't panic! Keep doing your job as usual, and use the tools at your disposal to help your fellow Humans who have yet to die!



As one of Them, sneak your way behind Humans and slash 'em to oblivion without being seen before they complete their mission and escape!

Features

  • 3D proximity voice chat
  • Text chat
  • Asymmetrical role-based gameplay
  • Up to 12-player lobbies

One of Them is a Social Deduction online 4 to 12-player game where you either play as an Astronaut trying to survive, or an alien beast out for blood. Sneak and convince your way to your objective. But always remember, no one can hear you scream.



As a Human, your goal is to find the tasks that have been assigned to you and complete them, while avoiding being killed by the beast. If you discover a dead body, you can report it to others and start a discussion to eliminate who (probably) did it.

Be careful, They will use anything in Their power to make you think one of your friends is guilty.

If you die, don't panic! Keep doing your job as usual, and use the tools at your disposal to help your fellow Humans who have yet to die!



As one of Them, sneak your way behind Humans and slash 'em to oblivion without being seen before they complete their mission and escape!

name: One of Them

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 7th Gen i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 10th Gen i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: An online Social Deduction horror game made for 4 to 12 players. Gravity Jump your way to safety, or sneak behind and eliminate unsuspecting prey and manipulate others into accusing someone else.
